name: Are you Smarter than a Sphinx?
name_original: Are you Smarter than a Sphinx?
description:
Every student makes this mistake at least once. When you walk into the wrong classroom, the teacher in there, to your surprise, is a sphinx! Today there is a test on her classroom subject: Greek Mythology. This isn't some regular test, though. If you get even one question wrong, she will eat you in front of the entire class. Good luck !

Made for Mini Jam 9 -Back to School-
